about_the_game:
"In the shadow of a dark war, the country has turned into a shattered wasteland. People are desperately struggling to survive. A journalist who lost his daughter in the war has taken on the mission to uncover the truth behind this painful loss.

ROSE is an action-adventure game filled with emotional depth and tension. Players will experience the devastating effects of the war and the struggle for survival through the eyes of the journalist character. The game features exploration, puzzle-platform, interaction with characters, and stunning combat scenes."
